description:
Want to eat at your favorite restaurant but don't want to struggle in traffic jams? Don't wait any longer, and save time! No more queues, traffic jams to eat at your favorite restaurant, the E-SAKAFO app takes care of everything.

The E-SAKAFOmg app is the easiest way to order your meals online from your smartphone or tablet. With your fingertips, access delicious cuisines (Chinese, Malagasy, European, ...) and a choice of restaurants that deliver to your city / neighborhood.
Perfect for office lunches, when you don't have time to leave work and struggle in traffic jams.

The free E-SAKAFO app is THE benchmark for home meal delivery. Discover in a simple and intuitive way a whole range of restaurants carefully selected for you in your smartphone or tablet and order what you like!

Join our community and download the E-SAKAFO app, the only way to:
- choose meals from the best restaurants near you
- order wherever you are
- track your order in real time

Questions, suggestions about our application ?
Send us an email via sales@e-sakafo.mg and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

Leave a comment!

Enjoy your meal !

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

Discover authentic street foods from around the world with Flavor Road. This comprehensive app helps you explore, track, and learn about traditional street foods through an interactive map, detailed encyclopedia, and personal food passport.
Navigate through a beautiful map interface to find street food locations across different countries and cities. Each food entry includes rich details like ingredients, flavors, cultural history, vendor stories, and dining etiquette. Filter foods by category, dietary preferences, or occasion to find exactly what you're looking for.
Build your culinary passport by marking foods as tried and adding favorites to your collection. Track your food journey with detailed statistics showing your exploration progress across different countries and food categories. Unlock achievements as you discover new foods and expand your culinary horizons.
Perfect for food enthusiasts, travelers, and anyone curious about global street food culture. Whether you're planning a trip or simply want to learn about different cuisines, Flavor Road brings the world's street food scene to your fingertips.

L'application soaci peut vous simplifier la vie et répondre à vos besoins en matière de commandes alimentaires et d'achats. Utilisez - le simplement sur votre téléphone ou votre tablette et vous pourrez déguster de délicieux plats et acheter vos produits préférés à portée de main. Gagnez du temps et profitez de la vie.

developer: TYG TURKEY ELEKTRONIK TICARET HIZMETLERI VE YATIRIMLARI ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
Get one step closer to fast and easy ordering with hundreds of options, from your favorite restaurant and grocery chains to local businesses in your neighborhood.

• Dozens of Restaurants and Grocery Stores
With the Trendyol GO by Uber Eats app, you can easily order your favorite dishes from hundreds of restaurants like Burger King, McDonald's, Domino's Pizza, Little Caesars, Popeyes, Komagene, and Starbucks, as well as your groceries from local stores in your neighborhood. Your order will arrive at your door in minutes.

• Local Businesses
The products of dozens of local businesses in your neighborhood, such as water brands, butchers, greengrocers, pet shops, florists, and nut shops, are now at your fingertips. You no longer need to go to different places for your shopping.

• Hundreds of Delicious Options & Products
Find exactly what you want from hundreds of delicious options, exactly what you need from hundreds of grocery products, and many other products you need from Your Neighborhood Shops.

• Special Offers and Great Discounts Just for You
Thanks to campaigns and features like Eat More, Save More, Flash Sales, Buy More, Save More, and cart comparisons, you can enjoy discounts on both your food orders and grocery shopping.

• Live Tracking
With GO by Uber Eats courier deliveries, you can track your order live on the map and see where the courier is in real time. When the courier arrives on your street, you'll happily run to the door.

Cuisiner va devenir un jeu d’enfant car vous simplifier la vie en cuisine est la mission que nous nous sommes fixée !
Trouvez des recettes à partir des ingrédients que vous avez dans vos placards et votre réfrigérateur en un clic. Découvrez la recette du jour, toujours de saison et toujours délicieuse ! Pour les indécis, notre menu de la semaine vous apportera des inspirations adaptées au temps dont vous disposez (peu en semaine, plus le week-end).
Quelles que soient vos attentes et vos contraintes (pas de temps, petit budget ou grande famille) vous trouverez une recette qui répond à vos besoins grâce à nos filtres et nos propositions quotidiennes.
 
Nouveau dans l’application Marmiton, le mode « personnalisé » accessible très facilement, qui vous permettra de retrouver toutes les recettes que vous avez sauvegardées pour pouvoir les conserver et les refaire. Vous pourrez également préciser les aliments que vous ne mangez pas ou encore les ustensiles que vous avez à votre disposition. Cela nous permettra bientôt de vous proposer une expérience encore plus personnalisée et adaptée à vos besoins… et vos envies J
 
Que faire quand j’ai trop faim ?
De votre index, appuyez sur la petite icône corail avec un « gant de cuisine » dedans (nous, quoi). Et laissez-vous guider !
 
Cuisiner rend heureux, cuisinez avec nous.

Marmiton regroupe les gourmands du monde entier (enfin, surtout ceux qui parlent français) autour d’une passion commune : Cuisiner (et manger aussi).
Au fil des années, Marmiton est devenu une communauté de millions de gourmands qui échangent au quotidien leurs recettes, leurs astuces, leurs conseils, leurs envies aussi et leurs rêves parfois.
Aujourd’hui, Marmiton c’est un site qui concentre plus de 75 000 recettes, un magazine bimestriel, une page Facebook qui regroupe 3 millions de gens, un compte Instagram avec 1 millions de fans aussi, des centaines de livres, des ustensiles et cette appli qu’il vous faut absolument ;)

CIBOUSCAN: Scan Your BEAUTY & FOOD Products – Health Score, Nutri-Score, NOVA and Recipes

CIBOUSCAN is the must-have app to take care of your health, your skin and the planet.
Scan your beauty products and groceries in seconds to see their full ingredients, health score, Nutri-Score, NOVA, additives, and find better alternatives that suit you.

Beauty: your bathroom under control
	•	Scan your cosmetics (skincare, body care, hair care, makeup, perfume).
	•	Get a complete health score for each product: ingredients list, controversial additives, potential impact on your health.
	•	Check the compatibility with your skin type, specific needs or allergies.
	•	Read real user reviews to choose wisely before buying.
	•	Create your personalized beauty routine and get a routine score to track and improve your habits every day.

Food: scan, decode, cook
	•	Scan your food products to see their Nutri-Score, NOVA, and any additives.
	•	Discover personalized recipes based on your food preferences, favorite or blacklisted products, allergies, diet and the season.
	•	Easily view your scan history to track your consumption over time.
	•	Get smart flexitarian recommendations designed to reduce your environmental impact while eating deliciously.

Practical, complete and privacy-friendly
	•	No account required: use all features completely anonymously.
	•	Works with and syncs automatically to the CIBOULETTE app if you already have it.
	•	One smart assistant for your beauty choices, grocery shopping, Nutri-Score and NOVA – all in one app.

Why choose CIBOUSCAN?
	•	One app to scan both BEAUTY and FOOD products.
	•	Access to health scores, Nutri-Score, NOVA, additives, skin compatibility.
	•	Real user reviews to help you compare and decide.
	•	Personalized recipes for healthy eating without frustration.
	•	A flexible and kind approach: better choices without forbidding what you love.
	•	Everything is anonymous, practical and made for you.

Download CIBOUSCAN now and join the CIBOULETTE team to shop smarter, eat better and take care of yourself and the planet.

** CibouScan is not affiliated with any other apps

Try Premium:

Upgrade to Premium for an ad-free experience. Subscriptions are billed to your Apple account and auto-renew unless turned off in App Store settings. Any unused portion of the free trial is forfeited upon purchase of a subscription.

- PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION -

Premium gives access to all the features of the application!

The subscription will be billed in a single payment. Payment is made through iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
The subscription will renew automatically within 24 hours before the end of the subscription. Your account will be debited 24 hours before your existing subscription ends, at the same price you paid the first time.
You can manage your subscription and auto-renewal by receiving you in your account settings after purchase.
If you pay for your subscription before the trial period expires, the remaining free trial period will be forfeited.

CGU / CGV: https://weblogit.co.uk/cgu.html
Privacy: https://weblogit.co.uk/privacy.html



We keep in touch ?
- Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/ciboulette.app/
- Site : https://ciboulette.app/
- Mail : henri@ciboulette.app - lisa@ciboulette.app

Whether you’re chasing dreams, running meetings, or taking a break — Zomato is built for the ones who don’t slow down. Craving biryani between brainstorms? A cheesy burger after a long day? Or just a salad and chai to keep things steady? With lightning-fast delivery from over 3 lakh restaurants, your fuel is never far. Order in seconds, track every bite, and keep going. Hustle harder – we’ve got the food.

▪ Search and Discover Top Restaurants and Dishes
From butter chicken to sushi, dal makhani to dimsums – and legends like Domino’s, Pizza Hut, McDonald’s, Starbucks, and more – Zomato puts your cravings on speed dial. Just decisions, made easy.

▪ Access Restaurant Details
 Menus, ratings, reviews, photos – everything you need to decide fast and eat faster. Rate your meal to guide the next hungry hustler.

▪ Try Veg Mode
Veg Mode curates top vegetarian dishes, veg-only restaurants, and even veg-only delivery fleets. Clean eating with no compromise.

▪ Schedule Your Orders
 Time is currency. Lock in your lunch or dinner before the hunger hits. The scheduling feature lets you plan ahead and stay on track.

▪ Food on Train
 Even when you’re on the move, Zomato keeps up. Enter your PNR, pick your dish, and get your meal delivered to your seat at 130+ stations. No chaos, no compromises –  just food (and your schedule) right on track.

Blinkit is India’s last minute app. Trusted by millions, it is your everyday online grocery shopping app that home-delivers 10,000+ daily groceries in just a blink. Buy milk products, fresh fruits & vegetables, daily grocery, kitchen, home & office items by shopping for them online on Blinkit. Enjoy easy and smooth app experience with quick delivery.

- Best price and quality fresh fruits & vegetables
- Milk, curd, bread, butter, eggs, cheese, paneer & other daily grocery
- Snacks, biscuits, chips, ice cream, chocolates
- Cold drinks, ice, bottle opener
- Atta, rice, dal, oil, masalas, noodles
- Personal care, detergent, cleaning supplies
- Diapers & baby care
- Pet food
- Bulbs, batteries, mobile chargers
- Emergency medicines, thermometer
- Kitchen tools like chopper, blender, grinder
- Puja needs
- Stationery
- Smart watches, LED lights, Headphones



Beauty & skincare store
Makeup, luxury beauty brands & everyday skincare – now on Blinkit! Shop a huge range of authentic makeup, bath & body, hair care products, beauty accessories & much more!

Electronics store
Wireless or bluetooth earphones? Check. Smart watches? Yes. LED lights? Absolutely! Shop affordable and latest electronics online at best prices, only on Blinkit.

Safe and quick grocery delivery app
The average driving speed for Blinkit (formerly Grofers) delivery agents is 20kmph, since we have a grocery delivery store located every 2 km to instantly serve you.

Many safe payment options
Do your grocery shopping online on Blinkit & pay safely and securely for your groceries with UPI, COD or cards / wallets / netbanking / buy now pay later. We accept Sodexo meal pass and Paytm food wallet too.

Authentic phone accessories
We don’t want you to wait for the most premium and authentic phone accessories out there – which is why you can get them in minutes on Blinkit.

Printouts delivered in minutes
With Blinkit, you can get a printout of anything delivered in just minutes. With convenient options of both black & white and coloured prints, get all your documents sorted instantly!

Low prices, amazing offers
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) offers you big discounts and savings on daily grocery, bundles and bank offers. We give the best prices on online groceries with our monthly House Full Sale!

Live order tracking & helpful customer support
Track your grocery order online, right from your payment being confirmed to the delivery of your groceries. In case you need help, simply tap & chat with our customer support executives who are always ready to assist you.

Delivering groceries in 20+ cities
Instantly do your grocery shopping online! Get delivery of milk, vegetables, bread, snacks & more on the Blinkit app in Ahmedabad, Bengaluru, Chandigarh, Chennai, Delhi, Faridabad, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Jaipur, Jalandhar, Kanpur, Kolkata, Lucknow, Ludhiana, Meerut, Mohali, Mumbai, Panchkula, Pune, Noida, Ghaziabad, Vadodara & Zirakpur.

Huge variety of local & international brands
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) grocery delivery app has a huge variety of shopping brands available online, including local specialities. In fact, Blinkit has brands you won’t find anywhere else. You can get delivery of daily grocery, festival special products, and even gourmet and international foods! Get the latest products from leading brands like boAt, The Wishing Chair, Ekam, MasterChow, The Body Shop, Farmley, Engage, The Whole Truth, The Moms Co, SuperBottoms, Tropicana, Nestle, Coca Cola, Lay’s, Harvest, Ferrero, Toblerone, Oreo, Nutella, Starbucks, Clinique, Kama Ayurveda, L'Occitane, Innisfree, Davidoff, Rage Coffee, Lindt, Starbucks, Blue Tokai, Sleepy Owl, Wingreens Farms, Bagrry's, Gunsberg, Jade Forest, Jimmy's Cocktails, Eveready, Nivea, Garnier, Lakmé, Haldiram's, Bikano, Heinz, Vahdam, Dettol, Cadbury, ITC, Colgate Palmolive, PepsiCo, Durex, Licious, Aashirvaad, Saffola, Patanjali, Fortune, 24 Mantra, TGL Co., Nestle, Amul, Dabur, & many more.

developer: Internet Services Polen Sp. z o.o.
description:
Discover the local choice for meals, groceries, and food delivery with foodpanda!

Life can get overwhelming, but we’re here to help! Whether you need daily meals, groceries, or shopping essentials, foodpanda has got you covered with convenient food delivery.

Order Your Favourite Food with Just 3 Simple Taps!

With foodpanda, you can easily choose the food you love, and we’ll deliver it right to your door. Serving millions across over 400 cities in 11 Asian markets — Singapore, Hong Kong, Thailand, Malaysia, Pakistan, Taiwan, the Philippines, Bangladesh, Laos, Cambodia, and Myanmar — foodpanda is your go-to for everyday food delivery.

Endless Food and Grocery Delivery Choices at Your Fingertips!
Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or fried chicken? We know the best restaurants near you – big famous brands and tiny local faves. Best part? We've got exclusive discounts and promos waiting for all new foodies. With a simple click, your food and groceries are on their way with fast delivery!

Need Groceries? We’ve Got You Covered!
Want to cook but short on time? Imagine having fresh produce, pantry staples, frozen goods, personal care items, your cute pets' needs, and much more, delivered in a flash — everything you need for a hassle-free home-cooked meal, all available through our speedy groceries delivery service from foodpanda shops and pandamarts.

Best Food and Grocery Delivery Deals Just for You!
Looking for the best savings on groceries and food? We regularly update our daily deals, personalised just for you! Here’s a tip: skip the queue and choose self pick-up for extra savings on your grocery orders, or enjoy the convenience of our food delivery options.

Save on tasty takeaways.
On the go? Try pick-up! Skip the queue and save up when you self-collect your order.

Worry-free package delivery.
Need to send or receive a parcel? Go with pandago. Our reliable fleet and on-demand delivery service will safely deliver it for you in no time.

Our tech is shaped by you.
Explore personalised offers and delicious picks just for you. Dish out what you feel about your order and let foodies know what’s yum. 

Want More? Join pandapro!
Unlock even greater savings on food delivery and grocery options with our pandapro membership today!

Live like a panda and let us take care of the rest — let’s do it the panda way with seamless food delivery!

For more info, please visit our website.

De l'apprenti cuisinier au chef étoilé, recherchez parmi des milliers de recettes de cuisine illustrées en photo ou en vidéo. Des recettes faciles aux astuces et secrets de chefs, renouvelez vos menus et épatez vos proches.

Découvrez des recettes originales notées, commentées et classées par genre, par ingrédient ou par difficulté. Que vous ayez envie de cuisiner une entrée, un plat ou un dessert pour vous ou vos amis, profitez de l’application Cuisine et de ses recettes variées :
● Petit déjeuner et goûter (brioche, crêpe, pain, brunch…)
● Apéritifs & buffet (amuse gueule, verrine, tartine….)
● Entrée (potage, soupe, terrine...)
● Tartes, quiches, pizzas
● Plats/viandes (poulet, porc, boeuf, agneau...)
● Plats/poissons et fruits de mer (crevettes, saint-jacques, crustacés...)
● Pâtes & riz (risotto, spaghetti, lasagne...)
● Légumes & gratins
● Sauce (béarnaise, béchamel, coulis...)
● Salade
● Dessert (pâtisserie, gâteau, fondant au chocolat...)
● Friandises & biscuits (muffin, cookie, macaron...)
● Cocktail

L’application Cuisine vous propose une cuisine du monde et de nos régions avec des grands classiques mais aussi des recettes originales.

Avec l’application Cuisine vous pourrez :
● Profiter des recettes détaillées étapes par étapes illustrées en photo et vidéos avec de nombreux avis.
● Retrouver un menu du jour composé par nos soins et actualisé quotidiennement pour vous donner des idées de repas.
● Rechercher des recettes par mots clés, ingrédients, types de plat, thèmes et difficultés.
● Retrouver les grands classiques de la cuisine classés par catégorie.
● Ajouter en un clic vos recettes favorites à votre carnet de recettes pour les retrouver facilement dans l’application mais aussi en ligne.
● Donner votre avis sur les différentes recettes proposées dans l’application.
● Recevoir si vous le souhaitez des idées de recettes via les notifications.

L'appli Cuisine, c'est votre livre de recettes personnalisé à portée de poche !

Vous souhaitez nous faire une suggestion, nous signaler un problème ? Contactez-nous par e-mail : iphone@journaldesfemmes.com

Vous cherchez une application pour vous aider à organiser vos repas, gagner du temps en cuisine et faire des économies ? 

Basta est l’app de batchcooking qui rend la préparation des repas simple et efficace.

Basta, c'est :

Des plans repas automatiques
Chaque semaine, Basta génère pour vous un planning adapté. Choisissez le nombre de repas que vous souhaitez préparer et obtenez une organisation claire et prête à cuisiner.

Des conseils et astuces batchcooking
Accédez à des articles pratiques, des guides et des recommandations pour améliorer vos sessions de batch cooking, mieux conserver vos plats et varier vos menus au quotidien.

Un suivi des statistiques et des économies
Visualisez vos progrès : temps gagné, argent économisé, nombre de repas préparés. Basta vous motive à continuer et à optimiser votre organisation.

Pourquoi choisir Basta ?
- Gain de temps grâce au batchcooking
- Repas variés, équilibrés et faciles à préparer
- Organisation simplifiée de vos menus et courses
- Suivi concret de vos résultats et de vos économies
- Application intuitive et pensée pour le quotidien


Basta, votre allié batchcooking

Avec Basta, finies les questions de dernière minute : "Qu’est-ce qu’on mange ce soir ?".
Préparez vos repas en une seule session, profitez d’un planning clair, économisez du temps et de l’argent, et adoptez enfin une routine batchcooking durable.

Téléchargez Basta dès aujourd’hui et simplifiez l’organisation de vos repas chaque semaine.
Nous vous proposons un essai gratuit pour créer vos sessions de batchcooking puis la création de session devient payante.
L'abonnement vous donnera aussi accès à d'autres fonctionnalités exclusives comme des statistiques plus poussées.

Conditions d'utilisations : https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Politique de confidentialité : https://lesignobles.com/projects/debatium/privacy/

Tous les jours c'est la même question qui revient: « on mange quoi ce soir »/ Avec l’appli Cuisine Actuelle la question ne se pose plus, trouvez la recette de cuisine qui vous plait. Que vous aimiez la cuisine gastronomique, la cuisine saine / vegan, ou bien la cuisine simple avec une recette facile et rapide à réaliser, notre application est faite pour vous.

Cuisine Actuelle, c’est des nouvelles idées recettes chaque jour, des conseils de préparation pour ne plus rater votre cuisson, des suggestions en fonction de ce qu’il y a dans votre frigo, ou encore des listes de courses pour cuisiner les plats qui vous donnent envie…

•        RECETTES 
Retrouvez des milliers d'idées recette avec la possibilité de sauvegarder vos coups de cœur, d’ajouter les ingrédients nécessaires à leur réalisation à votre liste de courses, et bien sûr nos conseils pour un menu réussi !

•        MON FRIGO
Dans cette rubrique, cochez les ingrédients présents dans votre frigo (viandes, légumes, poissons, fromages…) et on vous proposera un échantillon de recettes faites à partir de ces mêmes ingrédients. De quoi vous inspirer de délicieuses recettes digne d'un grand marmiton !

•        FAVORIS
Ici, retrouvez toutes vos idées recettes sauvegardées pour les réaliser plus tard…ou tout simplement vous mettre l’eau à la bouche !

•        LISTE DE COURSES
Une quiche vous a tapé dans l’œil mais il vous manque les œufs nécessaires à sa préparation ? Aucun souci, à partir de la recette, cochez les ingrédients qu’il vous manque et retrouvez-les dans votre liste de courses.

Un veritable livre de cuisine en ligne ? Bien plus que cela ! Maintenant que vous vous faites une idée de notre application, vous n’avez plus d’excuse pour ne pas cuisiner. Alors à vos marques… prêts… à vos marmites !

N’hésitez pas à nous contacter 

Nous améliorons l’application Cuisine Actuelle régulièrement afin de répondre à vos attentes et vous proposer un service toujours plus performant. Pour toute remarque ou suggestion d’amélioration, n’hésitez pas à nous contacter à l’adresse suivante : savmobile@prismamedia.com

Собирайте Ключи от Теремка и получайте скидки на заказы!

•	Накапливайте Монеты с каждого заказа
•	Получайте скидки в обмен на Монеты
•	Выполняйте условия Достижений, чтобы получить ещё больше Монет 
•	Получайте новые ключи от Теремка!

Ключ определяет, сколько вы копите Монетами с каждого заказа. Зарегистрируйтесь - и бронзовый ключ ваш. Совершайте покупки в Теремке и дойдите до платинового!

Как получить скидку в обмен на Монеты:

На кассе перед оплатой заказа сообщите, что вы хотите использовать Монеты. Откройте главную страницу приложения, нажмите "показать карту" и продиктуйте кассиру цифровой код. 1 монета - это 1 рубль вашей скидки.

Официальный сайт Теремок: https://teremok.ru

Зарегистрироваться в приложении можно только с российским номером телефона.

With 65 million users, Vivino is the world’s largest wine app and marketplace empowering people everywhere to enjoy wine to the fullest. Vivino provides wine drinkers access to unbiased information about wine from a community of millions. 

HOW IT WORKS
• Take a photo of any wine label or restaurant wine list or search by wine 
• Instantly see a wine’s rating, reviews, price, tasting notes, and suggested food pairings 
• Get your favorite bottles delivered to your door
• Add your ratings and reviews 
• Easily keep track of wines you like and discover new recommendations 
• Save the bottles you buy in your cellar, so you always know what you have on hand 
• Buy the right wine every time! 

VIVINO PREMIUM
Level up your wine game with...
• Our full scanning suite, including rapid-fire scanning so you can compare countless bottles within seconds
• Exact “match for you” scores for every single wine
• By-the-bottle insights into whether you usually like, loathe, or have never explored a wine style, grape, region
• Wine adventures to taste and play your way through Italy, Bordeaux, and beyond

STATS AT A GLANCE 
• 65 million app downloads and climbing 
• 16 million wines and counting from 245,000+ wineries 
• Millions of unbiased ratings and reviews 
• Hundreds of thousands of wines available for purchase in 18 markets worldwide  

KEY FEATURES
• Unbiased Ratings & Reviews: Leverage reviews and ratings from the world’s largest community of wine drinkers to always select the best wine. 
• Wine Buying Made Easy: Conveniently buy wine directly from the Vivino app. 
• Personalized Recommendations: Discover more wines you will love through Vivino’s wine recommendation engine that only suggests wines we know you will love based on your unique scanning, rating, and purchase behaviour, and community ratings. 
• Quick Compare: Pick the best wine on the shelf by scanning multiple wine labels in seconds to instantly view ratings, region, price, and food pairings all on one page. 
• Wine List Scanner: Select the right wine every time from any restaurant’s entire wine list. 
• Taste Characteristics: Know what the wine you’re eyeing tastes like before buying it. Taste Characteristics aggregates the most commonly used words to describe wines.
• Taste Profile: Track and organize your wines to determine your taste profile, discover new wines, and see how you rank against friends and the Vivino community.

Privacy policy: https://www.vivino.com/privacy
Terms of use: https://www.vivino.com/terms

Please note that we are not able to reply to comments or questions left in App Store reviews. If you have any support-related inquiries or need assistance, please contact support@vivino.com

Frigo Magic is the must-have application for anyone looking for quick and easy meal ideas using ingredients already in their fridge and cupboards. With nearly 2000 recipes and 7 million possible combinations, you are sure to find what you are looking for! 

Our application is particularly adapted to parents, students, single people or people who want to limit their food waste. With Frigo Magic, you can compose customized recipes in one click, with the food you have on hand, without having to go shopping. 

Our extra trick? Variation! You can change the foods in your recipe in a flash, for an even more personalized kitchen. And best of all, our application is completely free! 

To get started on Frigo Magic, you just need to enter the food you have in your fridge and cupboards, and the application will suggest suitable recipes. You can also specify how many people you're cooking for, your diet and your kitchen equipment, for even more personalized recipes. 

Once you've completed your fridge, you can explore all the recipes available on the app and save your favorites for easy retrieval. Each recipe comes with check-off steps and voice dictation to help you cook with ease. 

Finally, don't forget to share your best photos of dishes cooked with Frigo Magic on Instagram and Facebook! And if you encounter any technical issues, our team is available to help you by email at hello@frigomagic.com. 

Download Frigo Magic on the Apple Store now and never ask yourself the question "What's for dinner tonight?" again! 

Terms of use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ 

Privacy policy : https://www.frigomagic.com/fr/politique-de-confidentialite/

developer: Good To Go Foodworks Private Limited
description:
‘Good To Go’’ exactly knows how hard it is to detach yourself from that cushioned couch, traverse through hardships to reach at one of the neighbourhood meat shops, and ogle at the unpleasant process to score a few kilograms of mediocre quality meat.

Be it the juiciest chicken, the freshest catch of seafood or the most tender Lamb, we have the freshest & tender Meats handpicked for you, cut fresh and delivered to you at your doorstep with premium packaging at the most unbelievable prices, and love of course!

Very well rooted in the wholesale market, with a history of bringing food to your tables via the kitchens of some of the finest restaurants & hotels in Delhi-NCR, like the Hyatt, The Oberoi, The Leela, The Shangrila & The Claridges, just to name a few, we are now delivering Meats to more than 10,000 households in Delhi & Gurgaon, since 2015.

With Good To Go you will enjoy
- Free home delivery
- A hassle-free return policy
- Delivery in less than 2 hours
- Easy payment options like Cash on Delivery, Credit / Debit Card and Netbanking

DISCOVER SOMETHING NEW

Welcome to Sofra:
 Cooking game  - the perfect game for cooking lovers of any age. The peculiarity of the game is that you can repeat all the dishes yourself at home thanks to detailed recipes. The game will reveal the talent of a chef in everyone. The player's main goal is to cook a certain dish, following the recipe from the book. 

Main features of the game:
- Cozy unique design, which will allow you to plunge into the nice cute atmosphere of a home kitchen anywhere in the world.
- Ability to play for people of any age. In the game, you will find recipes of any complexity, from the simplest to the level of superchef.
- Simple interface that allows you to easily prepare your favorite dishes.
- The possibility of developing the story, up to opening your own restaurant.
- Kitchen and character upgrade, which will allow you to try yourself not only as a chef but also as a designer.
- A recipe book that can help you with the choice of a dish every day.
The player has to prepare the dishes according to the recipe. This requires the player to be logical and experiment in the cooking process. The player will have to collect stars and achievements, improve their cooking skills, and advance the story of the game.
Unlock additional content with various in-app purchases:

1. Get 4 exclusive levels + remove ads for $3.99
2. Get 15 levels each month and connect with your team + remove ads with auto renewable monthly subscription for $7.99
3. Get 10 exclusive levels + remove ads for $14.99

Privacy Policy - https://sofragame.com/privacypolicy
Terms of Use - https://sofragame.com/termsampconditions

//The most downloaded wine cellar management app in 2025!
Oeni helps you manage your wine cellar/collection and recommend the best wine at the best time (peak). Whether you're a seasoned collector or a casual wine lover, Oeni offers comprehensive tools to easily manage your wine inventory.

//Master your inventory at your fingertips
Oeni tracks the history of your cellar, its stock, and aging with precision and simplicity.

- Discover our immersive 3D wine cellar feature to easily visualize and organize your bottles, as if you were there!
- Scan and add your bottles quickly: With a directory of more than 400,000 bottles, including majestic wines, adding your wines to the Oeni cellar only takes a few seconds. Our application has similar performance to other well-known wine apps such as Vivino, VinoCell, Invintory, wine-searcher or CellarTracker.
- Specify their vintage: By adding the vintage of your bottles, Oeni will be able to recommend the ideal time to open them.
- Enter their purchase price: The purchase price of your bottles is a crucial element for tracking your expenses and investments over time.
- Monitor your stock: Oeni allows you to know your stock accurately and will help you manage it over time. Your cellar will no longer have any secrets for you.
- Analyze their aging: Follow the aging phases of each of your bottles to know their maturity level and peak date.
- Enjoy with the right dish: Oeni recommends food and wine pairings with over 5,000 dishes so you don't miss any tasting.
- Analyze Aging: Follow the aging phases of your wines to determine their maturity and peak dates. Oeni’s vino wine scanner feature helps you understand the aging process better.

//Track the financial value of your cellar
Oeni analyzes the price of each bottle and follows its evolution over time.

- Measure your expenses: Analyze your expenses month by month, year by year, to understand and adapt your budget.
- Know the value of your cellar: Every month, Oeni retrieves the market price of your bottles to continuously update the value of your cellar.
- Track your capital gains: Oeni informs you of your real-time capital gains and bottle by bottle, so you don't miss anything.
- Expense Analysis: Monitor your expenses month by month and year by year to better understand and manage your budget.
- Value Tracking: Oeni updates the market price of your bottles monthly, providing an accurate valuation of your cellar. Our wine reviews cellar feature keeps you informed about the current market trends.
- Capital Gains Monitoring: Stay informed about your real-time capital gains on each bottle to optimize your collection.

//A personal and intelligent sommelier
Oeni manages your wine cellar and recommends the right wine at the right time.

- Food and Wine Pairings: Choose from over 5,400 food and wine pairings to find the perfect pairing for any meal. Oeni will make recommendations as relevant, or even more relevant, than other apps like Vivino, cellartracker or Wine Scanner to provide you with the best recommendations.
- Refine your search by specifying the occasion: "an everyday wine," "a nice dinner with friends," or "for special occasions."
- Oeni will then analyze your wine cellar to find the perfect match based on food and wine pairings, the aging phases of your bottles, and their market value.
- Oeni offers its selection of bottles with a recommendation percentage for each of them. All you have to do is choose.

Additional Features :
- Extensive Wine Database: Access a database of over 400,000 bottles and 2,400 appellations.
- Detailed Wine Information: Get complete details on each bottle, including wine reviews and ratings
- Best cellar management tool for wine collection

More information on the terms of use and the privacy policy
- Privacy policy: https://oeni.app/en/politique-de-confidentialite/
- Terms of use: https://oeni.app/en/conditions-generales-dutilisation/

Dodo Pizza is perfect for a quick bite, a cozy family dinner, or a fun get-together with friends. It’s more than just fast food — we create our own recipes, work with trusted suppliers, and maintain quality at every step. So your food is always delicious, and delivery — fast.
CHOOSE AND ENJOY
– Hot pizzas on crispy crust with our signature sauce
– Tasty snacks — from light to hearty
– Delicious desserts for those with a sweet tooth
– Milkshakes and refreshing drinks
– Aromatic coffee for an energy boost
– Hearty breakfasts to start the day right
– Value combos to save


BUILD YOUR OWN PIZZA
– Try two flavors in one pizza
– Add or remove toppings
– Choose crust thickness


JOIN OUR LOYALTY PROGRAM
– Earn dodocoins — our in-app currency — and spend them on products
– Get personalized offers and discounts, including birthday deals


ORDER YOUR WAY
– Fast delivery to your door
– Takeaway when you’re nearby
– Table ordering in-store

TRACK YOUR ORDER
– Watch your pizza being prepared via live camera in the kitchen
– Track your courier on the map in real time

HAVE FUN WHILE YOU WAIT
– Stack pizza boxes in a fun mini-game
– Create your own stickerboard for in-store display


TRAVEL WITH US
Dodo has over 1300 restaurants in 20+ countries — and just one app. No need to reinstall anything when you’re abroad. Menu, delivery, offers, and service — everything works as usual.
Download the app now and order food in just a few taps. We do our best to keep it tasty, fast, and reliable. 
Got questions or suggestions? Reach out at mobile@dodopizza.com

developer: Talabat General Trading and Contracting Company
description:
Hey! Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app.

Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

"Pay online or in cash"
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

"Track your order from start to finish"
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

"Find exclusive deals"
Downloading the talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt.

Happy ordering.
